title: What is the interpretation of a dream about war by Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Interpretations of a dream about war: Seeing war in a dream raises a lot of fear and anxiety in the dreamer because of the resulting devastation and bloodshed. Therefore, in the following lines of the article, we will explain the different interpretations that scholars have come up with regarding a dream, and mention the difference between the dreamer being a man, a woman, or a girl. . Individuals, and what are the interpretations of seeing planes, missiles, killing, and other symbols. Interpretation of a dream about war: There are many connotations mentioned by jurists in the field of interpreting the vision of war in a dream, the most important of which are what can be clarified through the following: If you dream that you are sitting with soldiers in war and eating with them, this is a sign However, you will face many problems and conflicts with people you know, but they will not last long and you will be able to find solutions for them. And if you fight with a fighter during the war in the dream, this is a sign that you will earn a lot of money in the coming period and you will be able to achieve all your desires and goals. Planned. If you see the same person in a dream fighting using bows and arrows to kill the enemy, this symbolizes the fulfillment of hopes and goals soon, God willing. Seeing war soldiers in large numbers during sleep leads to a state of family instability that the viewer experiences in his life due to constant disputes between Family members. Interpretation of a dream about war by Ibn Sirin. We met the interpretations of the great scholar Muhammad Ibn Sirin - may God have mercy on him - in a dream about war: If you see a war in a dream, this is a sign that you will face problems with your family members, even if the sultan or ruler declares war, as this symbolizes the spread of chaos. And strife in the country, as well as diseases and epidemics.
